ValidationRule.description: QSEHRA Sales Rep Email is required for Product Type-QSEHRA Phase 1
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(OR(ISPICKVAL(Product_Type__c, "QSEHRA Phase 1"), ISPICKVAL(Product_Type__c, "QSEHRA Phase 1"), ISPICKVAL(Product_Type__c, "FSA PBA"), ISPICKVAL(Product_Type__c, "FSA PBA CONV"), ISPICKVAL(Product_Type__c, "FSA PBA Phase 1"), ISPICKVAL(Product_Type__c, "HSA")),ISBLANK(QSEHRA_Sales_Rep_Email__c))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: QSEHRA Sales Rep Email is required for Product Type-QSEHRA Phase 1
